description:
Turn puzzles into portraits with Pokémon™ Picross!
Solve over 300 number puzzles to complete pictures of your favourite Pokémon. When you complete a puzzle, you’ll add that Pokémon to your collection!
Collected Pokémon can help you solve puzzles using a variety of skills. There are 12 skills in all and their effects vary. Have fun collecting a lot of Pokémon and solving puzzles with their help!

Offers in-game purchases.
name: Pokémon™ Picross
